nodes.bodyText: The difference of ProcName and StringClassDetails is? The targetServer should add to toStringClassDetails?

proc name should be short. stringclassdetails should be all parameters. Sometimes the name and the stringclassdetails are the same if there is nothing much to show for a procedure.
In this case, I think target server is a fundamental attribute of RegionRemoteProcedure so thought it should be in the proc name. Could move it to the string details.....Let me do that.
Why only prefix? How about use the WAL directly?
You idea is better. Let me do it.
hmm... I only have a string... but let me just output the file name instead.
